name: NOEL (demo)
description:
"NoEL - Nothing on Elysion Line" is single-player deckbuilding Rogue-lite game.

Experience battles, build your own deck and - step in to the last part of epic.

Who is waiting at the final part?

◎ Grown by modifying decks, getting equipment, and eliminating bosses through the battle.

All characters have three different appearances as they grow.

◎ When you match the numbers that appear top bar in game, the card has a stronger options.

◎ In addition to battle, you can find sanctuary, rest, event, store, etc.

Our game is preparing for English translation, but it is currently a demo version that does not support translation services.
